price: 75.Waxay yidhaahdeen: Jazaha arrinkani23 waa in kii rarkiisa laga dhex helo loo heysto isaga naf ahaantiisa (addoon ahaan). Sidaasaan ku jaazaynaa daalimiinta.
arabic: قَالُواْ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥ مَن وُجِدَ فِي رَحۡلِهِۦ فَهُوَ جَزَٰٓؤُهُۥۚ كَذَٰلِكَ نَجۡزِي ٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ
footnotes: 23.Xeerkooda wuxuu dhigayey in tuuggii la qabto uu addoon u noqonayo cidduu wax ka xaday.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū jazāuhu man wujida fī raḥlihi fahuwa jazāuhu kadhālika najzī al-ẓālimīna
